location: East Ming Street, near Nangang MRT Station (370m to military cemetery station)
notes: Recently renovated within 1 year with mid-range finishes. 3BR/2BA corner unit with good natural light and clean condition. Building has elevator (2F of 13F). Includes parking, appliances, and furniture. Management fee NT$6,600/month extra. For baby safety: no specific concerns noted but standard precautions for balcony access recommended. No pets allowed, 1-year minimum lease.
